data.fullContent: I have been thinking that I need to more efficiently plan out my life. I've made a five-year plan, and hopefully by the end of it I'll be in a better place in my life. The first year I will search for a better job, and try to save up money. The third year I'll purchase a home, and stop wasting all my money on rent. If I can, I'll get married by the end of the fifth year.
data.answer: 我一直在想，我需要更有效地规划我的生活。我制定了一个五年计划，希望到这个计划结束的时候，我的生活能有一个更好的地方。第一年我会找一份更好的工作，并努力存钱。第三年我要买房，不再把钱浪费在房租上。如果可以的话，我会在第五年年底结婚。
